content:
Excuse my ignorance but not sure I follow. I can do Friday 10 or 11am EST. How do I "claim" this slot?

Anyone with link should be able to edit the doc, so anyone can simply add their topic to any open cell in columns B & C.
We have our opening "Plenary" session at 11am Eastern, so I'll put you down for Friday at 10:00am.
If anyone has tried to add their session to the google doc and had difficulties, let me know.

We've added two topics to the schedule for later today.

https://events.backdropcms.org/sessions/planning-and-prep-for-your-next-backdrop-project
https://events.backdropcms.org/sessions/necessities-for-site-owners
